titles.title: Fixing the daily hour of meeting of the First Session of the One Hundred Eleventh Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/6/2009--Passed House without amendment. Sets the daily hour of meeting of the First Session of the 111th Congress, until Monday, May 18, 2009, at: (1) 2 p.m. on Mondays; (2) 12 noon on Tuesdays; and (3) 10 a.m. on all other days of the week. Sets the daily hour of meeting from Monday, May 18, 2009, until the end of the first session at: (1) 12 noon on Mondays; (2) 10 a.m. on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays; and (3) 9 a.m. on all other days of the week.
